title: WB panchayat polls: Polling booth vandalised, ballot papers set on fire in Coochbehar
selftext: I never thought I would be able to show my kids elections of 90s, but here it is. Kids this is how elections were rigged in 90s
comments: Why is there no megathread related to the violence in West Bengal. There is no other post except this. If this was a BJP run state then there would have been 20 posts at least.
Bangal is the last bastion of free speech. If you start criticizing that then what is left?
Free speech means fair elections then
Have you actually been to r/Kolkata?
yes , but that is not the point I am making though.
It's a well known fact that she's Mudi in a saree
